extensionDescription.message: Detects times given with time zone abbreviations, and converts them to your local time.

popupPauseMenuTitle.description: Title text of the pause option menu

popupPauseMenuDomain.description: Pause the extension on this domain

popupPauseMenuPage.description: Pause the extension on this webpage

popupManualConvert.message: Manually convert times missing a stated time zone

popupRememberManualText.description: First part of the sentence used to by the user to pick whether or not this choice is saved

popupRememberManualTemp.description: Last part of the sentence. This is the users choice

popupRememberManualPage.description: Last part of the sentence. This is the users choice

popupRememberManualWebsite.description: Last part of the sentence. This is the users choice

popupCurrentlyUsedManualConversionTime.description: Informs the user of the current time zone abbreviation being used to manually localise times

popupSandboxTextarea.description: Place holder text for the sandbox's textarea

popupSandboxConvertTimesTo.description: Label text for the sandbox's timezone selection list

popupLocalTime.description: Option text for converting to the user's local time

popupVisuals.description: Button text for the visual options page tab

popupDetection.description: Button text for the detection options page tab

popupTimezones.description: Button text for the timezones options page tab

popupTimeFormat.description: Title of the time format option

popupDisplayOptions.description: Title of the display options section

popupShowClock.message: Include an analogue clock next to times
popupShowClock.description: Text for for the option to display an analogue clock next to the localised time

popupBlankSeparatorTitle.description: Title of the blank hour/minute separator option

popupBlankSeparatorDescription.description: Description for the blank separator option

popupAvoidManualFloatsDescription.message: Avoid times that could be non-integers
popupAvoidManualFloatsDescription.description: Description for the blank separator option

popupCorrectDSTconfusionDescription.message: Automatically convert times with DST mix ups
popupCorrectDSTconfusionDescription.description: Description for the automatically correct DST confusion option

popupSharedAbbrTitle.description: Title of the list section used to pick which timezones go with which abbreviation

popupSharedAbbrDesc.message:
Many timezones share an abbreviation.
You can select which are most relevant to you.
popupSharedAbbrDesc.description: Description of the shared abbreviation selection

popupIgnoreAbbrTitle.description: Title of the list section used to pick abbreviations are ignored

popupIgnoreAbbrDesc.message: Times using ignored abbreviations will not be localised in web pages.
popupIgnoreAbbrDesc.description: Description of the ignored abbreviations selection

popupUnableToFunction.message: The extension is unable to function on this page.
popupUnableToFunction.description: Displayed on pages that disallow the extension.

tooltipConverted.message: Converted to your local time from "$TIME$".
tooltipConverted.description: Tooltip shown when hovering over a converted time. Includes the orignal unconverted time

tooltipUnconverted.message: Converted to your local time this is "$TIME$".
tooltipUnconverted.description: Tooltip shown when hovering over an unconverted time. Includes the converted time
